column1: Bensonville is the capital city of Montserrado County
column2: Liberia. As of the 2008 national census
column4: 089. Bensonville is located 20 miles away from the national capital
column6: which is also located in Montserrado County. It is a commercial center for the surrounding agricultural area.It was the birthplace of William R. Tolbert

column10: Bensonville's industrial activity included producing milled rice
